text.0: great is this might of yours indra and soma the first high exploits were your own achievements.
text.1: ye found the sun ye found the light of heaven ye killed all darkness and the gods blasphemers.
text.2: ye indrasoma gave her light to morning and led the sun on high with all his splendour.
text.3: ye stayed the heaven with a supporting pillar and spread abroad apart the earth the mother.
text.4: ye slew the flood obstructing serpent vṛtra indra and soma heaven approved your exploit.
text.5: ye urged to speed the currents of the rivers and many seas have ye filled full with waters.
text.6: ye in the unripe udders of the milchkine have set the ripe milk indra thou and soma.
text.7: ye have held fast the unimpeded whiteness within these manycoloured moving creatures.
text.8: verily ye bestow indra and soma wealth famed victorious passing to our children.
text.9: ye have invested men ye mighty beings with manly strength that conquers in the battle.
